alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:11AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Chickasaw, northeastern Calhoun, southeastern Pontotoc, southern Itawamba, southern Lee and Monroe Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 211 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Belgreen to near Banner. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Fulton, Houston, Verona, Okolona, Bruce, Calhoun City, Shannon, Vardaman, Plantersville, Derma, Smithville, Tremont, Pittsboro, Prairie, Pyland, New Salem, New Wren and Trebloc. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Chickasaw; Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc
